species.name: Gossam
species.description: Although they rarely stand over 1.25 meters tall, Gossams have a striking appearance, with vivid yellow eyes and rugged, bumpy blue or green skin. Though they are short, their long necks and lithe forms lend them a semblance of greater height. Gossams move with an easy grace on three-toed feet, and their three-fingered hands are just as capable of fine manipulation as those of species with more digits.
species.specialAbilities: Smaller than average and count as silhouette 0.
